channel.title: Has jagex won?
channel.description:
So far, they have fucked up drop trading, imbalanced trades, and real world item selling ill tell you how.
-You can't intentionally kill yourself and get your lower level to get all the stuff. -Also, items not nescessary in the wilderness(which is now 40% smaller) cant be taken in -Wildy is 40% smaller so pkers can go to the corners of the wildy and come kill people -Teleblock is changed, now it just tracks a person and brings you close to them -The bounty hunter- what it does is, a player around your level comes into the wildy with you and you are supposed to track them down and kill them. Also, the skull over your head shows the value of your items. making the whole, switching from a rune scimmy to whip difficult. -You can now only win 3k per 15 minutes in the duel arena, also the duel arena is F2P now. The only good way to get money is to win the tournament thingies. The 3k cap stops real world trading -Imbalanced trades, don't work. So if someone wanted to loan you 200k, or someone wanted to sell a whip for like 1m or if you wanted to sell your gold, It won't work.
I look over all this and think that the Day of Reckoning has come. Maybe its time to move to another MMORPG, time to fuck them over. I belive we have lost. The only reason to auto is to level now.

item.title: Has jagex won?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Yoshi0308, post:11, topic:163995”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=222723.msg1924830#msg1924830 date=1197355750]
jagex can never win
[/quote]

It appears, they can.

I guess no more item transfer and buying gp? Unless we can figure out a new way. I wonder what it’s like on Sythe now? They probably shutdown the RS gold selling and stuff.[/quote]

Indeed, like 1000000 of the sythe members are just scammers or ppl wanting to sell on the black market. With the new updates this could compromise the members they get, it could make them improve because there are less scammers but also less legit people will join.

Read full topic

item.title: Has jagex won?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

So far, they have fucked up drop trading, imbalanced trades, and real world item selling ill tell you how.

-You can’t intentionally kill yourself and get your lower level to get all the stuff.
-Also, items not nescessary in the wilderness(which is now 40% smaller) cant be taken in
-Wildy is 40% smaller so pkers can go to the corners of the wildy and come kill people
-Teleblock is changed, now it just tracks a person and brings you close to them
-The bounty hunter- what it does is, a player around your level comes into the wildy with you and you are supposed to track them down and kill them. Also, the skull over your head shows the value of your items. making the whole, switching from a rune scimmy to whip difficult.
-You can now only win 3k per 15 minutes in the duel arena, also the duel arena is F2P now. The only good way to get money is to win the tournament thingies. The 3k cap stops real world trading
-Imbalanced trades, don’t work. So if someone wanted to loan you 200k, or someone wanted to sell a whip for like 1m or if you wanted to sell your gold, It won’t work.

I look over all this and think that the Day of Reckoning has come. Maybe its time to move to another MMORPG, time to fuck them over. I belive we have lost. The only reason to auto is to level now.
